accounts.name: yes_order_book
docs: Order book for YES side - must be pre-created by client with correct size

accounts.name: no_order_book
docs: Order book for NO side - must be pre-created by client with correct size

accounts.name: yes_fill_log
docs: Fill log for YES side - must be pre-created by client with correct size

accounts.name: no_fill_log
docs: Fill log for NO side - must be pre-created by client with correct size

accounts.name: vault
docs: Vault for this leg (seeded by index)

instructions.name: admin_close_account
docs: Close any program-owned account (for cleaning up old/incompatible accounts)
Only the admin can call this instruction

accounts.name: account_to_close
docs: The account to close - must be owned by this program

instructions.name: append_description
docs: Append to the description

instructions.name: append_market_question
docs: Append to the market question

instructions.name: append_rules
docs: Append to the rules

accounts.name: yes_fill_log
docs: YES fill log - validated in handler

accounts.name: no_fill_log
docs: NO fill log - validated in handler

accounts.name: yes_position
docs: YES position - receives shares back when cancelling NO bid (CoveredBy::Shares)

accounts.name: no_position
docs: NO position - receives shares back when cancelling YES bid (CoveredBy::Shares)

instructions.name: claim_creator_fees
docs: Claim accumulated creator fees from the creator vault
Only the market creator can call this instruction

accounts.name: creator
docs: Market creator - must sign

accounts.name: market
docs: Market account - verifies creator and provides PDA signing authority

accounts.name: creator_vault
docs: Creator vault (fee accumulator)

accounts.name: creator_ata
docs: Creator's USDC ATA (destination)

instructions.name: claim_dispute_winnings
docs: Claim dispute winnings after UMA resolution
The winner (proposer or disputer) receives the total bonds minus protocol fee

accounts.name: payer
docs: Anyone can call this (permissionless), but funds go to winner

accounts.name: market
docs: The resolved market

accounts.name: yes_order_book
docs: YES order book (for index validation)

accounts.name: no_order_book
docs: NO order book (for index validation)

accounts.name: resolution_proposal
docs: The resolution proposal

accounts.name: bond_vault
docs: Bond vault holding the bonds

accounts.name: winner_token_account
docs: Winner's USDC token account to receive payout

accounts.name: treasury_token_account
docs: Treasury USDC token account to receive protocol fee

accounts.name: usdc_mint
docs: USDC mint

accounts.name: yes_fill_log
docs: YES fill log - validated in handler

accounts.name: no_fill_log
docs: NO fill log - validated in handler

accounts.name: user_position
docs: User's position for this order's side (only needed for CoveredBy::Usdc)

instructions.name: close_market
docs: Close a market's vault and market account
Only the market creator or admin can call this instruction
Orderbooks must be closed first via close_orderbook

accounts.name: caller
docs: Creator or admin

accounts.name: vault
docs: Vault to close

accounts.name: caller_ata
docs: Caller's USDC ATA to receive any remaining vault funds

instructions.name: close_orderbook
docs: Close an order book after market resolution
Only the market creator or admin can call this instruction
Requires market is resolved and order_count == 0

accounts.name: caller
docs: Creator or admin

accounts.name: order_book
docs: Order book to close - validated in handler

accounts.name: vault
docs: Vault for this leg - validated in handler

accounts.name: creator_vault
docs: Creator vault - receives creator fees on fills

accounts.name: yes_order_book
docs: YES order book - validated in handler

accounts.name: no_order_book
docs: NO order book - validated in handler

accounts.name: yes_fill_log
docs: YES fill log - validated in handler

accounts.name: no_fill_log
docs: NO fill log - validated in handler

accounts.name: protocol_treasury
docs: Protocol treasury - receives protocol fees on fills

accounts.name: yes_position
docs: YES position - receives shares when buying YES, used as collateral when bidding NO

accounts.name: no_position
docs: NO position - receives shares when buying NO, used as collateral when bidding YES

instructions.name: create_market_info
docs: Create a new MarketInfo account with required fields

accounts.name: market_info
docs: MarketInfo account containing market metadata (description, rules, resolver_type, etc.)
Must not be locked and must have market_type == MultiLeg with "___" in question

accounts.name: creator_vault
docs: Creator vault for fee accumulation

accounts.name: market_info
docs: MarketInfo account containing market metadata (description, rules, resolver_type, etc.)
Must not be locked and must have market_type == Regular

accounts.name: yes_order_book
docs: Order book for YES side - must be pre-created by client with correct size

accounts.name: no_order_book
docs: Order book for NO side - must be pre-created by client with correct size

accounts.name: yes_fill_log
docs: Fill log for YES side - must be pre-created by client with correct size

accounts.name: no_fill_log
docs: Fill log for NO side - must be pre-created by client with correct size

accounts.name: vault
docs: Vault for this market (index 0 for regular markets)

accounts.name: creator_vault
docs: Creator vault for fee accumulation

instructions.name: dispute_resolution
docs: Dispute a resolution proposal (escalate to UMA via LayerZero)
Disputer posts a higher bond and the market is sent to UMA for final resolution

accounts.name: disputer
docs: The disputer submitting the dispute

accounts.name: market
docs: The market being disputed (boxed to reduce stack size)

accounts.name: market_info
docs: MarketInfo account containing resolver_type and rules

accounts.name: yes_order_book
docs: YES order book (for index validation)

accounts.name: no_order_book
docs: NO order book (for index validation)

accounts.name: resolution_proposal
docs: The resolution proposal being disputed

accounts.name: bond_vault
docs: Bond vault holding the proposer's bond

accounts.name: disputer_token_account
docs: Disputer's USDC token account

accounts.name: usdc_mint
docs: USDC mint

instructions.name: finalize_resolution
docs: Finalize a resolution after dispute window expires (no dispute)
Returns the proposer's bond and resolves the market to the proposed outcome

accounts.name: payer
docs: Anyone can call finalize after dispute window expires

accounts.name: market
docs: The market being finalized

accounts.name: market_info
docs: MarketInfo account containing resolver_type

accounts.name: yes_order_book
docs: YES order book (for index validation)

accounts.name: no_order_book
docs: NO order book (for index validation)

accounts.name: resolution_proposal
docs: The resolution proposal

accounts.name: bond_vault
docs: Bond vault holding the proposer's bond

accounts.name: proposer_token_account
docs: Proposer's USDC token account to receive bond back

accounts.name: usdc_mint
docs: USDC mint

instructions.name: finalize_vote_resolution
docs: Finalize vote resolution after deadline passes (WalletVoteResolver markets only)
Anyone can call - resolves to 50/50 Split if no majority reached

accounts.name: payer
docs: Anyone can finalize after deadline

accounts.name: market
docs: The market to finalize

accounts.name: market_info
docs: MarketInfo account containing resolver_type

accounts.name: yes_order_book
docs: YES order book (for index validation)

accounts.name: no_order_book
docs: NO order book (for index validation)

accounts.name: vote_state
docs: Vote state account - must exist (initialized during voting)

instructions.name: init_lz_store
docs: Initialize the LayerZero OApp store

accounts.name: vault
docs: Vault for this leg - validated in handler

accounts.name: creator_vault
docs: Creator vault - receives creator fees on fills

accounts.name: yes_order_book
docs: YES order book - validated in handler

accounts.name: no_order_book
docs: NO order book - validated in handler

accounts.name: yes_fill_log
docs: YES fill log - validated in handler

accounts.name: no_fill_log
docs: NO fill log - validated in handler

accounts.name: protocol_treasury
docs: Protocol treasury - receives protocol fees on fills

accounts.name: yes_position
docs: YES position - receives shares when buying YES, used as collateral when bidding NO

accounts.name: no_position
docs: NO position - receives shares when buying NO, used as collateral when bidding YES

accounts.name: vault
docs: Vault for this leg - validated in handler

accounts.name: creator_vault
docs: Creator vault - receives creator fees on fills

docs: YES order book - validated in handler

accounts.name: no_order_book

accounts.name: yes_fill_log

accounts.name: no_fill_log

accounts.name: protocol_treasury
docs: Protocol treasury - receives protocol fees on fills

accounts.name: yes_position
docs: YES position - receives shares when buying YES, used as collateral when bidding NO

accounts.name: no_position
docs: NO position - receives shares when buying NO, used as collateral when bidding YES

instructions.name: lz_quote_send
docs: Get quote for sending a cross-chain message

instructions.name: lz_receive
docs: Handler for processing incoming cross-chain messages

instructions.name: lz_receive_types
docs: Handler that returns the list of accounts required to execute lz_receive

instructions.name: lz_resolve_market
docs: Request market resolution via cross-chain message
Sends market pubkey, index, and rules to the destination chain for resolution

accounts.name: payer
docs: Anyone can request UMA resolution at any time

accounts.name: market
docs: The market to request resolution for

accounts.name: market_info
docs: MarketInfo account containing rules

accounts.name: yes_order_book
docs: YES order book (for index validation)

accounts.name: no_order_book
docs: NO order book (for index validation)

accounts.name: vault
docs: Vault for this leg - validated in handler

accounts.name: yes_order_book
docs: YES order book - validated in handler

accounts.name: no_order_book
docs: NO order book - validated in handler

accounts.name: yes_fill_log
docs: YES fill log - validated in handler

accounts.name: no_fill_log
docs: NO fill log - validated in handler

accounts.name: creator_vault
docs: Creator vault - receives creator fee

accounts.name: protocol_treasury
docs: Protocol treasury - receives protocol fee

accounts.name: referral_account
docs: Referral account - optional (pass system program to skip)
When this is a valid token account, it must be passed as writable from the client.

accounts.name: vault
docs: Vault for this leg - validated in handler

accounts.name: yes_order_book
docs: YES order book - validated in handler

accounts.name: no_order_book
docs: NO order book - validated in handler

accounts.name: yes_fill_log
docs: YES fill log - validated in handler

accounts.name: no_fill_log
docs: NO fill log - validated in handler

accounts.name: creator_vault
docs: Creator vault - receives creator fee

accounts.name: protocol_treasury
docs: Protocol treasury - receives protocol fee

accounts.name: referral_account
docs: Referral account - optional (pass system program to skip)
When this is a valid token account, it must be passed as writable from the client.

instructions.name: propose_resolution
docs: Propose a resolution for a market (first tier)
Anyone can propose at any time after market creation with a USDC bond

accounts.name: proposer
docs: The proposer submitting the resolution

accounts.name: market
docs: The market to propose resolution for

accounts.name: market_info
docs: MarketInfo account containing resolver_type

accounts.name: yes_order_book
docs: YES order book (for index validation)

accounts.name: no_order_book
docs: NO order book (for index validation)

accounts.name: resolution_proposal
docs: The resolution proposal account (PDA)

accounts.name: bond_vault
docs: Bond vault to hold proposer and disputer bonds

accounts.name: proposer_token_account
docs: Proposer's USDC token account

accounts.name: usdc_mint
docs: USDC mint

instructions.name: redeem_position
docs: Redeem a position after market resolution
Winners receive $1.00 per share, losers receive $0
Split outcome: all shares receive $0.50 each
Position account is closed after redemption

accounts.name: yes_order_book
docs: YES order book (for index validation)

accounts.name: no_order_book
docs: NO order book (for index validation)

instructions.name: resolve_expired_market
docs: Resolve an expired market to a 50/50 split
Anyone can call this after the deadline if no proposal exists
Both YES and NO shares will redeem at $0.50 each

instructions.name: set_description
docs: Set the description (replaces existing)

instructions.name: set_event_deadline
docs: Set the event deadline

instructions.name: set_lz_peer_config
docs: Admin instruction to set or update cross-chain peer configuration

instructions.name: set_market_question
docs: Set the market question (replaces existing)

instructions.name: set_market_type
docs: Set the market type (Regular or MultiLeg)

instructions.name: set_resolver_type
docs: Set the resolver type (UmaResolver or WalletVoteResolver)

instructions.name: set_rules
docs: Set the rules (replaces existing)

instructions.name: truncate_description
docs: Truncate the description to a specified length

instructions.name: truncate_market_question
docs: Truncate the market question to a specified length

instructions.name: truncate_rules
docs: Truncate the rules to a specified length

instructions.name: verify_market
docs: Toggle verification status of a market
Only the authorized verifier can call this instruction

accounts.name: verifier
docs: Verifier must match the constant VERIFIER_PUBKEY

instructions.name: vote_resolution
docs: Cast or change a vote on market resolution (WalletVoteResolver markets only)
Auto-finalizes when majority (>50%) is reached

accounts.name: voter
docs: The voter casting a vote

accounts.name: market
docs: The market being voted on

accounts.name: market_info
docs: MarketInfo account containing resolver_type and voter list

accounts.name: yes_order_book
docs: YES order book (for index validation)

accounts.name: no_order_book
docs: NO order book (for index validation)

accounts.name: vote_state
docs: Vote state account (PDA) - initialized on first vote

types.name: AddOrderbookSetParams
docs: Parameters for adding a new orderbook set (leg) to a market

fields.name: index
docs: Index for this leg (must match current legs.len())

types.name: CoveredBy
docs: What collateral backs an order

types.name: CreateMarketParams
docs: Parameters for creating a new market
Note: description, rules, and resolver_type are now in MarketInfo account

types.name: DisputeResolutionParams
docs: Parameters for disputing a resolution and escalating to UMA

fields.name: dst_eid
docs: Destination endpoint ID (e.g., Sepolia testnet)

fields.name: options
docs: LayerZero options

fields.name: native_fee
docs: Native fee for LayerZero

fields.name: lz_token_fee
docs: LZ token fee (usually 0)

types.name: FillLog
docs: Persistent fill tracking for a single order book
This account stores settlement state and is never closed,
allowing users to claim their filled orders even after the orderbook is closed
Seeds: [b"fill_log", market.key(), &[index], &[side as u8]]

fields.name: market
docs: The market this fill log belongs to

fields.name: index
docs: Index identifying which leg of a multi-leg market

fields.name: side
docs: Side (YES or NO)

fields.name: _padding
docs: Padding for alignment

fields.name: ticks
docs: Per-tick settlement tracking

types.name: LzAccount
docs: same to anchor_lang::prelude::AccountMeta

types.name: LzReceiveTypesAccounts
docs: LzReceiveTypesAccounts PDA is used by the Executor as a prerequisite to calling `lz_receive`

types.name: LzStore
docs: Store PDA for LayerZero OApp configuration
This account represents the "address" of the OApp on Solana

fields.name: last_message
docs: Last received cross-chain message (for debugging/tracking)

types.name: Market
docs: Market account that holds shared constants and per-leg data
Space is manually calculated using calculate_regular_market_space/calculate_multileg_market_space
String length constraints are enforced at runtime in instruction handlers

fields.name: market_id
docs: Unique market identifier

fields.name: creator
docs: Creator of the market

fields.name: market_info
docs: Reference to MarketInfo account (contains description, rules, resolver_type, etc.)

fields.name: category
docs: Market category (max 32 chars, validated at runtime)

fields.name: image_uri
docs: Image URI for the market (max 128 chars, validated at runtime)

fields.name: created_at
docs: When the market was created

fields.name: min_order_size
docs: Minimum order size in USDC base units

fields.name: fee_bps
docs: Trading fee in basis points (e.g., 100 = 1%)

fields.name: verified
docs: Whether this market has been verified by an admin

fields.name: market_type
docs: Market type containing per-leg data

types.name: MarketData
docs: Per-leg market data (order books, vault, resolution state)
For Regular markets, there is one MarketData. For MultiLeg markets, there is a Vec<MarketData>.

fields.name: name
docs: Short title/name for this leg (e.g., "BTC above 50k")

fields.name: yes_order_book
docs: YES order book account for this leg

fields.name: no_order_book
docs: NO order book account for this leg

fields.name: yes_fill_log
docs: YES fill log account for this leg (persistent fill tracking)

fields.name: no_fill_log
docs: NO fill log account for this leg (persistent fill tracking)

fields.name: vault
docs: USDC vault for this leg

fields.name: resolving_deadline
docs: Deadline by which this leg must be resolved (50/50 fallback if missed)

fields.name: status
docs: Current status for this leg

fields.name: winning_side
docs: Winning side for this leg (only valid when status == Resolved)

fields.name: resolving_state
docs: Resolution request state for this leg

fields.name: shares_outstanding
docs: Total share pairs in circulation for this leg (YES == NO == this value)

fields.name: total_volume
docs: Total trading volume in USDC base units for this leg

types.name: MarketInfo
docs: MarketInfo account - stores market metadata separately from operational data
This allows for larger text fields (rules, description) via multi-tx append operations
Once used by a market, this account becomes immutable (authority set to None, is_locked = true)

fields.name: authority
docs: Authority who can modify this account (None = immutable)

fields.name: is_locked
docs: Whether this MarketInfo has been consumed by a market

fields.name: market_type
docs: Market type indicator (Regular or MultiLeg)

fields.name: resolver_type
docs: Resolver type (UmaResolver or WalletVoteResolver)

fields.name: event_deadline
docs: Event deadline - when the real-world event occurs (unix timestamp in seconds)
Different from resolving_deadline which is when resolution must happen

fields.name: market_question
docs: Market question (must contain "___" if MultiLeg)

fields.name: description
docs: Market description

fields.name: rules
docs: Resolution rules (can be arbitrarily long via append operations)

types.name: MarketInfoType
docs: Market info type indicator (does not contain leg data)

types.name: MarketStatus
docs: Market status

types.name: MarketType
docs: Market type enum - Regular (single leg) or MultiLeg (multiple legs)

fields.name: index
docs: Index identifying which leg of a multi-leg market this order belongs to

fields.name: side
docs: Which side this order is for (YES or NO)

fields.name: price
docs: Price in 0.1 increments (1-999)

fields.name: order_id
docs: Order ID within the price tick

fields.name: amount
docs: Number of shares

fields.name: seed
docs: Unique seed for PDA derivation

fields.name: covered_by
docs: What backs this order - determines claim payout

types.name: OrderBook
docs: Order book implemented as a Red-Black Tree

fields.name: index
docs: Index identifying which leg of a multi-leg market this order book belongs to
For regular markets, this is always 0

fields.name: market
docs: The market this order book belongs to

fields.name: order_count
docs: Number of active orders

fields.name: fill_log
docs: Reference to the associated FillLog account (for fill tracking)

fields.name: ticks
docs: Per-tick order ID counter

fields.name: orders
docs: Red-Black Tree storing orders

types.name: OrderCancelled
docs: Emitted when an order is cancelled

fields.name: market
docs: The market this order belongs to

fields.name: user
docs: The user who cancelled the order

fields.name: order
docs: The order PDA

fields.name: side
docs: YES or NO side

fields.name: price
docs: Price in basis points

fields.name: amount
docs: Number of shares cancelled

fields.name: order_id
docs: Order ID

fields.name: refund_amount
docs: Amount refunded (USDC or shares)

fields.name: covered_by
docs: Whether backed by USDC or shares

fields.name: timestamp
docs: Timestamp of cancellation

types.name: OrderPlaced
docs: Emitted when a new limit order is placed

fields.name: market
docs: The market this order belongs to

fields.name: user
docs: The user who placed the order

fields.name: order
docs: The order PDA

fields.name: side
docs: YES or NO side

fields.name: price
docs: Price in basis points (1-999)

fields.name: amount
docs: Number of shares

fields.name: order_id
docs: Order ID within the price tick

fields.name: covered_by
docs: Whether backed by USDC or shares

fields.name: timestamp
docs: Timestamp of the order

types.name: OrderSide
docs: Order side enum (YES or NO outcome, None for unresolved, Split for 50/50)

types.name: OrderTree
docs: Red-Black Tree stored as raw bytes

types.name: PeerConfig
docs: PeerConfig PDAs store configuration for each remote chain
For each remote chain, a PeerConfig PDA is created with the remote EID as part of the seed

fields.name: market
docs: The market this position belongs to

fields.name: index
docs: Index identifying which leg of a multi-leg market this position belongs to

fields.name: user
docs: The user who owns this position

fields.name: side
docs: The side of the position (Yes or No)

fields.name: amount
docs: The number of shares held

types.name: PositionClaimed
docs: Emitted when a position is claimed from a filled order

fields.name: market
docs: The market this order belongs to

fields.name: user
docs: The user who owned the order

fields.name: order
docs: The order PDA

fields.name: side
docs: YES or NO side

fields.name: price
docs: Price in basis points

fields.name: claimed_amount
docs: Number of shares claimed

fields.name: order_closed
docs: Whether the order is now fully claimed (closed)

fields.name: covered_by
docs: Whether backed by USDC (claims shares) or Shares (claims USDC)

fields.name: timestamp
docs: Timestamp of the claim

types.name: PositionUpdated
docs: Emitted when a position is updated

fields.name: market
docs: The market this position belongs to

fields.name: user
docs: The user who owns the position

fields.name: side
docs: YES or NO side

fields.name: old_amount
docs: Previous amount

fields.name: new_amount
docs: New amount

fields.name: delta
docs: Change in amount (positive for increase, could track separately)

fields.name: timestamp
docs: Timestamp of the update

types.name: ProposeResolutionParams
docs: Parameters for proposing a resolution

fields.name: proposed_outcome
docs: Proposed outcome: 1 = Yes, 2 = No

types.name: ProposedOutcome
docs: Represents the proposed outcome (Yes or No)

types.name: ResolutionProposal
docs: Resolution proposal account for the two-tier resolution system
Seeds: ["resolution_proposal", market.key(), index]

fields.name: market
docs: The market this proposal is for

fields.name: index
docs: Index identifying which leg of a multi-leg market this proposal is for

fields.name: proposer
docs: The proposer who submitted the initial resolution

fields.name: proposed_outcome
docs: The proposed outcome (Yes or No)

fields.name: proposer_bond
docs: Bond amount deposited by proposer (in USDC base units)

fields.name: proposed_at
docs: Timestamp when the proposal was submitted

fields.name: disputer
docs: The disputer (if disputed), otherwise Pubkey::default()

fields.name: disputer_bond
docs: Bond amount deposited by disputer (in USDC base units)

fields.name: disputed_at
docs: Timestamp when disputed (0 if not disputed)

fields.name: is_settled
docs: Whether the resolution has been settled (UMA result received)

fields.name: bonds_claimed
docs: Whether the bonds have been claimed by the winner

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed

types.name: ResolverType
docs: Resolver type - determines how market resolution is handled

fields.name: voters
docs: List of wallet addresses that can vote (max 10)

types.name: ResolvingState
docs: Tracks resolution request state (separate from MarketStatus to allow trading during resolution)
Two-tier system: Propose -> (Finalize | Dispute -> UMA -> Complete)

types.name: SharesMerged
docs: Emitted when shares are merged (redeemed for $1)

fields.name: market
docs: The market where shares were merged

fields.name: user
docs: The user who merged shares

fields.name: amount
docs: Number of share pairs merged

fields.name: usdc_received
docs: USDC received

fields.name: timestamp
docs: Timestamp of the merge

types.name: Trade
docs: Emitted when a market buy or sell trade occurs

fields.name: market
docs: The market where the trade occurred

fields.name: user
docs: The user who initiated the trade

fields.name: index
docs: The market leg index (0 for single-leg markets)

fields.name: side
docs: YES or NO side

fields.name: is_buy
docs: Whether this was a buy or sell

fields.name: shares
docs: Total shares traded

fields.name: usdc_amount
docs: Total USDC amount

fields.name: avg_price
docs: Average price (in basis points, calculated as usdc_amount / shares / 1000)

fields.name: fills_count
docs: Number of orders matched

fields.name: timestamp
docs: Timestamp of the trade

types.name: VoteRecord
docs: Represents a single voter's vote

fields.name: voter
docs: The voter's wallet address

fields.name: vote
docs: Vote value: 0=not voted, 1=Yes, 2=No

fields.name: voted_at
docs: Timestamp when the vote was cast (0 if not voted)

types.name: VoteResolutionParams
docs: Parameters for casting a vote

fields.name: vote
docs: Vote value: 1 = Yes, 2 = No

types.name: VoteState
docs: Vote state account for WalletVoteResolver markets
Tracks votes from authorized voters for market resolution
Seeds: ["vote_state", market.key(), index]

fields.name: market
docs: The market this vote state belongs to

fields.name: index
docs: Index identifying which leg of a multi-leg market this is for

fields.name: total_voters
docs: Total number of authorized voters

fields.name: yes_votes
docs: Number of YES votes

fields.name: no_votes
docs: Number of NO votes

fields.name: votes
docs: Vote records for each voter (max 10)

fields.name: is_finalized
docs: Whether voting has been finalized

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed
